refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.description: At Yaalo, we are committed to delivering a smooth and reliable experience. This refund policy outlines clear guidelines for refund eligibility, processes, and exceptions, ensuring transparency in rare cases where a refund request is necessary.

content.text: Coverage Issues: If the eSIM cannot be installed due to network coverage limitations, you may request a refund or plan change.
Technical Issues: Refunds are possible only if the issue originates from Yaalo and no data has been consumed.
Data Package Validity: No refunds are issued for unused data once the plan validity period expires.
Accidental Purchases: No refunds are available once the eSIM has been installed or used.
Incorrect Charges: Billing disputes must be reported within 12 days of purchase with clear justification.
Fraudulent Activities: Yaalo reserves the right to deny refunds in cases of suspected abuse, policy violations, or fraud.
Phone Compatibility: Customers must verify device eSIM compatibility prior to purchase. Refunds are not issued for incompatibility.
One-Time Purchase: All eSIM purchases are one-time and non-refundable.
Virtual Numbers: Virtual numbers do not support WhatsApp or similar platforms. Failure to receive OTP codes is not refundable.
Time Frame: Refund requests must be submitted within 30 days of purchase.
Cooperation: Customers must cooperate promptly during troubleshooting for refund eligibility.
Notification: Submit refund requests via email to support@yaalo.com with all relevant purchase details.
Unauthorized Purchases: Subject to investigation and internal approval.
Modification Requests: No plan modifications or customizations are permitted after purchase.
Service Suspension: Temporary or permanent service suspension may occur without notice and is not refundable.
Refund Deadline: No refunds are permitted after 60 days from the purchase date, regardless of installation status.
Fair Usage Policy: Applies to all eSIM bundles and plans.
Liability Disclaimer: Yaalo is not responsible for network outages or third-party carrier disruptions.
Warranty Disclaimer: Continuous network availability is not guaranteed.
For questions or assistance regarding refunds, please contact our support team at support@yaalo.com. We are here to ensure a smooth and hassle-free experience.
